testcase.name: captureResponseInVariable

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"firstName":"Godavarthi","lastName":" Sakhi Adyu","id":"43","subjectId":"3"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("ContentType.JSON", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
